activities: Marqeta works with financial institutions and business enterprises to issue and manage loyalty and payment solutions.  Consumers opt into these programs and provide personal data as part of the enrollment, know your customer (KYC), and activation processes.  Additional information may be collected over time as the consumer makes use of the products in order to provide improved service and to minimize risk.
personaldata: Marqeta receives information about customers Clients including but not limited to: name, office, personal and mobile telephone numbers, company and home address, card account numbers and transaction details, card website login credentials, click-stream data and other preference information, email address,  and government issued ID (such as passport) Personal Information
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
